basic_concepts.title: Understanding Personal Finance
basic_concepts.content: Personal finance is about managing your money and financial decisions. It includes budgeting, saving, investing, and planning for your future.

basic_concepts.title: Budgeting Basics
basic_concepts.content: A budget is a financial plan that helps you track income and expenses. It's the foundation of financial success.

investment_fundamentals.title: Getting Started with Investments
investment_fundamentals.content: Investing is putting money into financial products with the expectation of generating returns over time.

investment_fundamentals.title: Understanding Risk and Return
investment_fundamentals.content: Higher potential returns typically come with higher risk. Diversification helps manage risk.

success_stories.title: Sarah's Journey to Financial Independence
success_stories.content: From paying off debt to building a diverse investment portfolio, Sarah's story inspires women to take control of their finances.

success_stories.title: Maria's Investment Success
success_stories.content: How Maria built a successful retirement portfolio while balancing career and family.
